de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot.index

Class TreeSphereVisualization<D extends NumberDistance<D,?>,N extends AbstractMTreeNode<?,D,N,E>,E extends MTreeEntry<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.AbstractVisualization
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot.AbstractScatterplotVisualization
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot.index.TreeSphereVisualization<D,N,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - Tree node type
    E - Tree entry type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStoreListener, ResultListener, Visualization, EventListener

    public class TreeSphereVisualization<D extends NumberDistance<D,?>,N extends AbstractMTreeNode<?,D,N,E>,E extends MTreeEntry<D>>
extends AbstractScatterplotVisualization
implements DataStoreListener
    Visualize the bounding sphere of a metric index.
